Ingredients: Chili Powder, Coconut, Fish, Garlic, Mustard Seeds, Salt, Tamarind
Instructions: Heat oil in a pan over medium heat. Add Mustard Seeds and let them splutter. Add Garlic and saute  1-2 minutes. Add Chili Powder and mix well. Add the main ingredients and coat with the masala. Add water as needed cover and cook until done. Add grated Coconut and cook for 2 more minutes. Season with Salt and serve.
Description: A thyroid-friendly fish recipe made with balanced spices and wholesome ingredients for better metabolism.

Add water as needed cover and cook until done. Garnish with Coriander Leaves and serve.
Description: Ash gourd coriander curry, aromatic, light, and thyroid-friendly.

Description: A nutritious curry with moringa pods.

Ingredients: Chayote, Chili, Coriander Leaves, Curry Leaves, Garlic, Ginger, Mustard Seeds, Onion, Sesame Oil, Tomato, Turmeric Powder
Instructions: Heat Sesame Oil in a pan over medium heat. Add Mustard Seeds and let them splutter. Add Curry Leaves and fry briefly. Add Onion and saute  golden brown. Add Garlic, Ginger and saute  1-2 minutes. Add Tomato and cook until it turns mushy. Add Turmeric Powder, Chili Powder and mix well. Add the main ingredients and coat with the masala. Add water as needed cover and cook until done. Garnish with Coriander Leaves and serve.
Description: A light and crunchy chayote curry.

Add the chopped vegetables and stir well. Add Turmeric Powder, Chili Powder and mix thoroughly. Cook on medium heat for 8-10 minutes stirring occasionally. Season with Salt and serve hot.
Description: A unique and light betel leaf stir-fry.

Instructions: Heat Sesame Oil in a pot add Mustard Seeds and let them splutter. Add Curry Leaves and let them crackle. saute  until golden brown. Add Tomato and cook until soft. Description: A fiber-rich and spicy banana stem rasam.

Ingredients: Banana Stem, Chili, Coriander Leaves, Curry Leaves, Garlic, Ginger, Mustard Seeds, Onion, Sesame Oil, Tomato, Turmeric Powder
Instructions: Heat Sesame Oil in a pan over medium heat. Add Mustard Seeds and let them splutter. Add Curry Leaves and fry briefly. Add Onion and saute  golden brown. Add Garlic, Ginger and saute  1-2 minutes. Add Tomato and cook until it turns mushy. Add Turmeric Powder, Chili Powder and mix well. Add the main ingredients and coat with the masala. Add water as needed cover and cook until done. Garnish with Coriander Leaves and serve.
Description: A fiber-rich and savory banana stem curry.

Instructions: Heat Sesame Oil in a pan. Add Mustard Seeds and let them splutter. Add Curry Leaves. Add all vegetables and spices. Cook on medium heat stirring occasionally. Season with Salt and serve hot.
Description: A nutrient-rich dal with siru keerai (amaranth greens).

Ingredients: Asafoetida, Black Pepper, Chili, Coriander Leaves, Cumin Seeds, Curry Leaves, Mustard Seeds, Onion, Sesame Oil, Tamarind, Tomato, Turmeric Powder, Vallarai Leave
Instructions: Heat Sesame Oil in a pot add Mustard Seeds and let them splutter. Add Curry Leaves and let them crackle. saute  until golden brown. Add Tomato and cook until soft. Add Turmeric Powder, Chili Powder and mix well. Add water and bring to a boil. Add Tamarind extract and simmer for 5-7 minutes. Season with Salt and serve hot.
Description: A medicinal and spicy vallarai (centella) rasam.

Ingredients: Asafoetida, Chili, Coconut, Curry Leaves, Mustard Seeds, Onion, Sesame Oil, Snake Gourd, Turmeric Powder, Urad Dal
Instructions: Heat Sesame Oil in a pan over medium heat. Add Mustard Seeds and let them splutter. Add Curry Leaves and saute  Add Onion and saute  translucent. Add the chopped vegetables and stir well. Add Turmeric Powder, Chili Powder and mix thoroughly. Cook on medium heat for 8-10 minutes stirring occasionally. Season with Salt and serve hot.
Description: A light and crunchy pudalangai (snake gourd) stir-fry.

Ingredients: Asafoetida, Chili, Coconut, Curry Leaves, Drumstick, Mustard Seeds, Sesame Oil
Instructions: Heat Sesame Oil in a pan. Add Mustard Seeds and let them splutter. Add Curry Leaves. Add all vegetables and spices. Cook on medium heat stirring occasionally. Season with Salt and serve hot.
Description: A nutrient-rich murungakkai (drumstick) sundal.

Ingredients: Bitter Gourd, Chili, Coriander Leaves, Cumin Seeds, Curry Leaves, Garlic, Mustard Seeds, Onion, Sambar Powder, Sesame Oil, Tamarind, Toor Dal, Turmeric Powder

Ingredients: Chili, Coriander Leaves, Curry Leaves, Garlic, Ginger, Mustard Seeds, Onion, Sesame Oil, Spinach, Th, Tomato, Turmeric Powder, U Green
Instructions: Heat Sesame Oil in a pan over medium heat. Add Mustard Seeds and let them splutter. Add Curry Leaves and fry briefly. Add Onion and saute  golden brown. Add Garlic, Ginger and saute  1-2 minutes. Add Tomato and cook until it turns mushy. Add Turmeric Powder, Chili Powder and mix well. Add the main ingredients and coat with the masala. Add water as needed cover and cook until done. Garnish with Coriander Leaves and serve.
Description: A nutrient-rich thandu keerai (amaranth stem) curry.

Instructions: Heat Sesame Oil in a pan over medium heat. Add Mustard Seeds and let them splutter. Add Curry Leaves and fry briefly. Add Onion and saute  golden brown. Add Garlic, Ginger and saute  1-2 minutes. Add Tomato and cook until it turns mushy. Add Turmeric Powder, Chili Powder and mix well. Add the main ingredients and coat with the masala. Add water as needed cover and cook until done. Garnish with Coriander Leaves and serve.
Description: A nutrient-rich murungai keerai curry.

Instructions: Heat Sesame Oil in a pan over medium heat. Add Mustard Seeds and let them splutter. Add Curry Leaves and fry briefly. Add Onion and saute  golden brown. Add Garlic and saute  1-2 minutes. Add Tomato and cook until it turns mushy. Add Turmeric Powder, Chili Powder and mix well. Add the main ingredients and coat with the masala. Add water as needed cover and cook until done. Garnish with Coriander Leaves and serve.
Description: A traditional Tamil-style kulambu dish, suitable for hypothyroidism diet, flavorful and healthy.

Garnish with Coriander Leaves and serve.

Add Turmeric Powder, Chili Powder and mix well. Add water and bring to a boil. Add Tamarind extract and simmer for 5-7 minutes. Season with Salt and serve hot.
Description: A healthy South Indian soup dish suitable for thyroid-friendly diets.

Instructions: Heat Sesame Oil in a pan over medium heat. Add Mustard Seeds and let them splutter. Add Curry Leaves and saute  Add Onion and saute  translucent. Description: A healthy South Indian legume dish suitable for thyroid-friendly diets.

Ingredients: Eggs, Chili, Coriander Leaves, Cumin Seeds, Curry Leaves, Garlic, Ginger, Mustard Seeds, Onion, Sunflower Oil, Tomato, Turmeric Powder

Description: A healthy South Indian egg dish suitable for thyroid-friendly diets.

Ingredients: Fish, Chili, Coconut, Coriander Leaves, Cumin Seeds, Curry Leaves, Garlic, Ginger, Mustard Seeds, Onion, Sesame Oil, Sunflower Oil, Tamarind, Tomato, Turmeric Powder

Description: A healthy South Indian fish dish suitable for thyroid-friendly diets.

Add Garlic, Ginger and saute  1-2 minutes. Add Tomato and cook until it turns mushy. Add Turmeric Powder, Chili Powder and mix well. Add the main ingredients and coat with the masala. Add water as needed cover and cook until done. Garnish with Coriander Leaves and serve.
Description: A healthy South Indian rice dish suitable for thyroid-friendly diets.

Add Garlic, Ginger and saute  1-2 minutes. Add Tomato and cook until it turns mushy. Add Turmeric Powder, Chili Powder and mix well. Add the main ingredients and coat with the masala. Add water as needed cover and cook until done. Garnish with Coriander Leaves and serve.
Description: A healthy South Indian egg dish suitable for thyroid-friendly diets.

Add Garlic and saute  1-2 minutes. Add Tomato and cook until it turns mushy. Add Turmeric Powder, Chili Powder and mix well. Add the main ingredients and coat with the masala. Add water as needed cover and cook until done. Garnish with Coriander Leaves and serve.
Description: A thyroid-friendly kuzhambu recipe made with balanced spices and wholesome ingredients for better metabolism.

Add Garlic, Ginger and saute  1-2 minutes. Add Tomato and cook until it turns mushy. Add Turmeric Powder, Chili Powder and mix well. Add the main ingredients and coat with the masala. Add water as needed cover and cook until done. Garnish with Coriander Leaves and serve.
Description: A thyroid-friendly leafy recipe made with balanced spices and wholesome ingredients for better metabolism.

Add Garlic, Ginger and saute  1-2 minutes. Add Tomato and cook until it turns mushy. Add Turmeric Powder, Chili Powder and mix well. Add the main ingredients and coat with the masala. Add water as needed cover and cook until done. Garnish with Coriander Leaves and serve.
Description: A thyroid-friendly rice recipe made with balanced spices and wholesome ingredients for better metabolism.

Add Garlic, Ginger and saute  1-2 minutes. Add Tomato and cook until it turns mushy. Add Turmeric Powder, Chili Powder and mix well. Add the main ingredients and coat with the masala. Add water as needed cover and cook until done. Garnish with Coriander Leaves and serve.
Description: A thyroid-friendly leafy recipe made with balanced spices and wholesome ingredients for better metabolism.

Ingredients: Eggs, Chili, Coriander Leaves, Cumin Seeds, Curry Leaves, Garlic, Mustard Seeds, Onion, Pepper, Sunflower Oil, Tomato, Turmeric Powder
Instructions: Heat Sunflower Oil in a pan over medium heat. Add Mustard Seeds and let them splutter. Add Curry Leaves and saute  Add Onion and saute  translucent. Add Garlic and saute  1 minute. Add the chopped vegetables and stir well. Add Turmeric Powder, Chili Powder and mix thoroughly. Cook on medium heat for 8-10 minutes stirring occasionally. Season with Salt and serve hot.
Description: A thyroid-friendly egg recipe made with balanced spices and wholesome ingredients for better metabolism.
